desc: URLhaus Threat Intelligence integration enables reputation checks for URLs, domains, hosts, and file hashes using the Abuse.ch URLhaus database. This helps identify known malware distribution points, malicious infrastructure, and suspicious payloads for alert enrichment and automated response workflows.
